title: Tasty Chicken Satay  Recipe
content:
Chicken satay tastes so deliciously hot, it is a Thai dish and taste so nutty and tasty. The chicken turned out so juicy and moist.

I recently tried this and I was kind of addicted to it because it turned out to be very delicious. It was spicy and juicy and smoky, everything you want a kebab to be.

 

Chicken Satay Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 20 mins

Total time: 30 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Thailand

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

Boneless Chicken - 500 grams

Garlic - 6 cloves chopped finely

Peanut Butter - ¼ cup

Soy Sauce - 1 tablespoon

Salt to taste

Black pepper - 1 teaspoon

Red Chilli Flakes - 1 teaspoon

Lemon Juice - 2 tablespoons

 

Instructions

Mix all ingredients in a bowl. Add in chicken and mix well.

Marinate for 30 mins.

Skewer the chicken and cook on a pan on both sides till done.

Serve it with cucumber.

recommendations.title: Tasty Cheesy Chicken ( Leftover ) Wrap Recipe
recommendations.content:
Super easy and fast wrap recipe to use up leftover chicken. If you have some cooked chapati in the fridge then this recipe can be put together in just a few minutes.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
